item.title: dep: The Go Dependency Manager
item.description: dep This is a prototype dependency management tool for Go. It requires Go 1.8 or newer to compile. The dep project is the official experiment, but not yet the official tool. Check out the Roadmap for more on what this means! Current status It is safe to use dep in production. That means two things: Any valid metadata file (Gopkg.toml and Gopkg.lock) will be readable and considered valid by any future version of dep.
